label: 含綬鳥
対訳語: The motif of a bird carrying a strand of beads in its beak.
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: Originating in Sassanian Persia and also seen in Byzantine art, often holding ribbons instead of beads,this motif traveled across Central Asia through China and into Japan via the Silk Road. See also Hanakuidori.　[花喰鳥]
